page.title: 05Where the children go to sch
page.content: In Rowney Green the children mostly go to school at Bealey nd Abbey in Redditch. The children of younger than schol age go to a nursery in alveschurch which is close by. Some children go to other schools. There is only one nursery school that we saw and it was hidden away. There are no other schools in walking distance. Partrick Motors bought the area and started a village with a school which was started in 1880 with to pupils and then it went to 30 pupils 15 years after it was built. Then it was pulled down in 1895 and built on by a member of the Cadbury family.
